statements: SELECT * FROM food_preferences WHERE person_id = 1;
SELECT name, age FROM food_preferences WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT person_id, name FROM food_preferences WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM food_preferences WHERE food_preference LIKE '%Vegetarian%';
SELECT person_id, name, age, gender, food_preference FROM food_preferences WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT age, name FROM food_preferences WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM food_preferences WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT name, food_preference FROM food_preferences WHERE age <= 25 AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY food_preference DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM food_preferences WHERE age IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM food_preferences WHERE food_preference LIKE '%pizza%' AND name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM food_preferences WHERE age > 30
SELECT id, name, favorite_food FROM food_preferences WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT program_name, target_community FROM nutrition_programs WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT favorite_food, gender FROM food_preferences WHERE age < 20 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM food_preferences WHERE favorite_food LIKE '%pizza%'
SELECT id, name, age, gender, favorite_food FROM food_preferences WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, favorite_food FROM food_preferences WHERE gender='Male' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40
SELECT id, name, age, favorite_food FROM food_preferences WHERE favorite_food='Pizza' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT program_id, program_name, target_community FROM nutrition_programs WHERE start_date>'2022-01-01' AND end_date<'2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM nutrition_programs WHERE target_community LIKE '%Health%'
SELECT * FROM Preferences WHERE age > 30;
SELECT person_id, name, age FROM Preferences WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM FoodTypes WHERE food_category = 'Fruits' AND nutrition_value = 'High';
SELECT person_id, name, favorite_food FROM Preferences JOIN FoodTypes ON Preferences.favorite_food = FoodTypes.food_name;
SELECT member_id, community_name FROM CommunityMembers WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Preferences WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, age, favorite_food FROM Preferences WHERE gender = 'Female' AND favorite_food IN ('Pizza', 'Pasta') ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT person_id, name, community_name FROM Preferences JOIN CommunityMembers ON Preferences.person_id = CommunityMembers.person_id WHERE join_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT p.name, f.food_name, f.food_category FROM Preferences p JOIN FoodTypes f ON p.favorite_food = f.food_name ORDER BY p.name ASC;
SELECT gender, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM Preferences GROUP BY gender HAVING total_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM FoodPreferences;
SELECT user_id, name, age FROM FoodPreferences WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, gender, favorite_food FROM FoodPreferences WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM CommunityGroups ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT group_id, group_name, leader_id FROM CommunityGroups WHERE leader_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM FoodPreferences WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, favorite_food FROM FoodPreferences WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT program_name, duration FROM NutritionEducation WHERE duration < 6 ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CommunityGroups WHERE location LIKE 'New%' AND group_name <> 'Newbie Group';
SELECT p.program_name, pe.enrollment_date FROM ProgramEnrollment pe JOIN NutritionEducation p ON pe.program_id = p.program_id WHERE pe.user_id = 12345 ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM food_preferences ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, preference FROM food_preferences WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT group_name, description FROM food_groups WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM nutrition_info WHERE calories > 200 ORDER BY food_name ASC;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM nutrition_programs WHERE community_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM food_preferences ORDER BY name DESC, age ASC
SELECT id, name, gender FROM community_members WHERE age > 30
SELECT food_name, calories, protein, fats FROM nutrition_info WHERE carbohydrates < 50
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM nutrition_programs WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT group_name, description FROM food_groups
